subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Derian Hatcher scored midway through the third period and Antero Niittymaki stopped 38 shots, helping the Philadelphia Flyers beat the Florida Panthers, 1-0, on Sunday for their third straight victory.
snippet: Derian Hatcher scored midway through the third period and Antero Niittymaki stopped 38 shots, helping the Philadelphia Flyers beat the Florida Panthers, 1-0, on Sunday for their third straight victory.
